query:
SELECT id as "id!: i32", 
code as "code!: Option < String >", 
status as "status!: AccountMergeStatus", 
created_at as "created_at!: UtcDateTime", 
destination_id as "destination_id!: String", 
source_id as "source_id!: Option < String >" FROM account_merges WHERE (NOT $1::boolean OR id = $2::int4) AND (NOT $3::boolean OR code = $4::varchar) AND (NOT $5::boolean OR status = $6::account_merge_status) AND (NOT $7::boolean OR status = ANY(CAST($8 as account_merge_status[])) ) AND (NOT $9::boolean OR created_at = $10::timestamptz) AND (NOT $11::boolean OR created_at > $12::timestamptz) AND (NOT $13::boolean OR destination_id = $14::varchar) AND (NOT $15::boolean OR source_id = $16::varchar) ORDER BY 
      (CASE ($17 = 'Id' AND NOT $18) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($17 = 'Id' AND $18) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($17 = 'Code' AND NOT $18) WHEN true THEN code ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($17 = 'Code' AND $18) WHEN true THEN code ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($17 = 'Status' AND NOT $18) WHEN true THEN status ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($17 = 'Status' AND $18) WHEN true THEN status ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($17 = 'CreatedAt' AND NOT $18) WHEN true THEN created_at ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($17 = 'CreatedAt' AND $18) WHEN true THEN created_at ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($17 = 'DestinationId' AND NOT $18) WHEN true THEN destination_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($17 = 'DestinationId' AND $18) WHEN true THEN destination_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($17 = 'SourceId' AND NOT $18) WHEN true THEN source_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($17 = 'SourceId' AND $18) WHEN true THEN source_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
     LIMIT $19 OFFSET $20 FOR UPDATE
